label: uncl6343
comment: Code qualifying the type of currency.

values.label: Customs valuation currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit involved in the transaction for customs valuation.

values.label: Insurance currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit involved in the transaction for insurance purposes.

values.label: Home currency
values.comment: The currency of the local monetary unit.

values.label: Invoicing currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit used for calculation in an invoice.

values.label: Account currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit of an account.

values.label: Reference currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit to be converted from.

values.label: Target currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit to be converted into.

values.label: Price list currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit used in a price list.

values.label: Order currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit used in an order.

values.label: Pricing currency
values.comment: [5077] The currency of the monetary unit used for pricing purposes.

values.label: Payment currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit used for payment.

values.label: Quotation currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit used in a quotation.

values.label: Recipient local currency
values.comment: The currency of the local monetary unit at recipient's location.

values.label: Supplier currency
values.comment: The currency of the monetary unit normally used by the supplier.

values.label: Sender local currency
values.comment: The currency of the local monetary unit at sender's location.

values.label: Charge calculation currency
values.comment: The currency in which the charges are calculated.

values.label: Tax currency
values.comment: The currency in which tax amounts are due or have been paid.
